claim_card.claim: The auxiliary v1 metrics (v1_energy_ratio, v1_peak_shift) act as secondary qualifiers of regime/stability and do not carry the primary observed-vs-Gaussian separation signal in this pipeline.
claim_card.test_hook: Evaluate cohort separation using only v1_energy_ratio and v1_peak_shift; compare their discriminative consistency to D1_L2 and Z_mf across the same lmax sweep.

source.locator: p4 (Section II.C.2); p5â€“6 and p8 (Results on auxiliary v1 qualifiers); p9 Conclusion
source.note: Selective separation is concentrated in morphology-sensitive channels
